thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Steve Connor
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Steve Connor

author: Steve Connor
title: Steve Connor
text: Been buying RR Sports running shoes for almost 25 years. Was an avid runner then became avid fast Walker in 2000. Lately im just a Dog walker, but i love my RR running shoes. Website is really good, service is always great. And the prices are really great with VIP.
